mapper.insert: insert into x$io_global_by_wait_by_bytes (event_name, total, total_latency, min_latency, avg_latency, max_latency, count_read, total_read, avg_read, count_write, total_written, avg_written, total_requested) values (#{event_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{total,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{total_latency,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{min_latency,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{avg_latency,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{max_latency,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{count_read,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{total_read,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{avg_read,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{count_write,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{total_written,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{avg_written,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{total_requested,jdbcType=BIGINT})
